lead_paragraph: Wladimir Klitschko, the International Boxing Federation heavyweight champion, will defend his title against Lamon Brewster in a rematch July 7 in Cologne, Germany. In a 2004 fight for the World Boxing Organization title, Brewster won with a fifth-round technical knockout. Last month, Klitschko (48-3 with 43 knockouts) needed only a few punches to stop Ray Austin in the second round. Brewster (33-3 with 29 knockouts) lost the W.B.O. title in April 2006 to Sergei Liakhovich in a unanimous decision.
